item.title: Exxon was added to our Best Stocks list last week. Its fundamentals are bottoming at the right time
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo look through Exxon Mobil.

item.title: Wells Fargo upgrades Nike as headwinds dissipate for the apparel maker
item.description: Wells Fargo sees shares of Nike rising 17% from here.

item.title: This fintech stock is on fire this year. How to bet on more gains, while hedging, using options

item.title: Oppenheimer raises Nvidia price target ahead of earnings report
item.description: Oppenheimer sees shares of Nvidia rising a further 37%.

item.title: Morgan Stanley names Micron a top pick, cites memory shortage leading to new earnings highs
item.description: Morgan Stanley's revised price target implies a 33% upside for shares of Micron.
